message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $1000000.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. I believe this is a reasonable price, considering the value it brings to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $1175000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the value I place on it.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1075000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1075000. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $1150000. This is still a good deal for both of us, considering the product's value to you and the value I place on it.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell it to you for $1125000. This is still a good deal for both of us, considering the product's value to you and the value I place on it.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to pay $1075000 for the product, and that's my final offer. I hope you can understand my position.

I understand that you've reached your limit, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $1075000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and sell it to you for $1100000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in it.
